Aws certified machine learning – specialty

AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty

Amazon Web Services (AWS)
$300 (approx ₹25,000)
Advanced

Recommended Courses: Courses like Introduction to Machine Learning, Data Science and Management, Advanced Machine Learning

Skills Covered: Model Deployment, Data Engineering, Feature Engineering, Cloud ML Tools

Exam Format: 65 questions, 180 minutes, online proctored

Validity: 3 years

Official Website: https://aws.amazon.com/certification/certified-machine-learning-specialty/

Overview

Validates expertise in building, training, and deploying ML models on AWS — a must-have for data and ML professionals using cloud infrastructure.

Overview

The AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty certification demonstrates advanced knowledge in designing, building, and deploying ML models in the cloud using AWS services such as SageMaker and Lambda.

Recommended Background

Students who excel in:

  • Introduction to Machine Learning (IML)
  • Data Science and Management (DSM)
  • Advanced Machine Learning
  • Cloud Computing (if available)

will have the right mix of theory and applied skills for this exam.

Skills You’ll Gain

  • Building scalable ML pipelines
  • Automating model training and tuning
  • Deploying models to production
  • Monitoring and optimizing model performance

Exam Details

  • Format: 65 questions (MCQ and multiple response)
  • Duration: 180 minutes
  • Mode: Online or in-person testing center

Fees and Validity

  • Fee: $300 (~₹25,000)
  • Validity: 3 years

Official Resources

  • AWS Certification Portal →
  • AWS Skill Builder →

Career Outlook

Common roles after this certification include:

  • Machine Learning Engineer
  • Data Scientist
  • AI Solutions Architect
  • Cloud ML Developer

Perfect for students combining data science + systems expertise.
